text: John Lemoyne "Jack" Mills (May 8, 1918 – February 11, 2007) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Youngstown Bears and averaged 2.3 points per game. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:American naval personnel of World War II Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:Military personnel from Ohio Category:Mount Union Purple Raiders men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Youngstown, Ohio Category:Youngstown Bears players
title: Jack Mills (basketball)
